about_the_game:
The BLEED RUNNER Original Soundtrack is a compilation of all major songs and ambience tracks from BLEED RUNNER for your listening pleasure, composed by Jackson Kubo and Brandon Skylar.

Songs are provided in MP3 format, and a song from an early prototype ("Lo-Fi Waves to Bleed Out To") is included as a bonus track.
detailed_description:

Songs are provided in MP3 format, and a song from an early prototype ("Lo-Fi Waves to Bleed Out To") is included as a bonus track.
name: BLEED RUNNER Original Soundtrack
